title: 🍃 Verbena Harvest 🌿
origin: Morocco, North Africa, South America, Mediterranean
description: A calming herbal tea high in antioxidant.
steps: While on the branch, spray leaves with water to remove dust
Once dry, cut branches or strip leaves
Place leaves on a linen table cloth to dry (do not use vinyl, vinyl chokes the leaves)
Flip on table cloth until its really curled and crispy.  If it's not super dry, you will get mold
notes: Verbena is a great antioxidant and can be used in many recipes.  Great before sleep and for stomach ache.
memory: The aroma of drying verbena fills the kitchen with a sense of calm.
author: Meme
